## Source: amazon-inspector (ea8ee55f0fba70e99bcfd17466e3bb1bf57b3bbdd3e6f7a61a54673d0b78aff5)
The package @deputyapp/copilot2 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e4d87eb825013bd349713caf54711ff430c5f1bb476da6fb634734af796b0108)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@deputyapp/copilot2' @ 2.10.20 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
